title: The meeting invitation are not working as expected
body:
When I am trying to join a meeting and my browser redirection is on, the teams app pops up with blue screen and I cannot do anything. I have to completely close the app and start it again.

With the redirector off I can easily join the call on my browser.

The above description is for version 1.8.1

For version 1.9 it looks a little different,
the team's app is reloading and I am going back to the main page with all the chats

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to the Prospect Mail or OWA and try to join any teams meeting

**Expected behavior**
I should be redirected to the teams call settings and them I should be able to join the call

Logs from the shell script


 - Version [e.g. 0.1.17]


I am running Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
